title: Eugene Levin – Semrush profileAuthor Photo
description: Semrush's digital marketing blog is an innovative resource for content strategy, content marketing, SEO, SEM, PPC, social media and more.
content: New Authority Score: The Most Manipulation-Resistant MetricA major update to our Authority Score metric makes it easier to accurately evaluate domain reputability. New improvements include factoring in organic traffic and common spam signals, a visualizer, and a Network Graph report that identifies PBNs and signs of natural/unnatural link profiles. Our solution, Semrush Authority Score, is the most trustworthy source of website authority. Try it for free today.Link BuildingJan 31, 2023How Authority Score Resists Manipulation (Data Study)Learn about Semrush‘s updated Authority Score, built to resist spam and manipulation. Read our study comparing it to Moz Domain Authority & Ahrefs Domain Rating. See how our score correlated with organic traffic and spam signals & get an accurate read on domain authority.Link BuildingJan 31, 2023Volume Update! Why Semrush Search Volume Is the Most Accurate on the Market (Study)As a marketer, your success depends on the quality of the data you use to make decisions.Original Research & StudiesJun 22, 2022March 2022 Search Volume Study: Details & MethodologyToday we announced an improvement to our search volume accuracy in our US database. This post explains the technical details of how we did it.Original Research & StudiesMar 22, 2022
